entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
